doctor.name: Dr. Abdullah Al Mukit
doctor.info: Dr. Abdullah Al Mukit is a Liver Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), BCS (Health), MD (Hepatology), MACP (USA), MRCPS (Glasg). He is a Consultant, Hepatology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Abdullah Al Mukit at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 4.30pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Mohd. Harun Or Rashid
doctor.info: Dr. Mohd. Harun Or Rashid is a Liver Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS (Medicine), MD (Hepatology), PhD, FACP (USA). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Hepatology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohd. Harun Or Rashid at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 6:30pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Rofiqul Islam
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Rofiqul Islam is a Liver Specialist in Rajshahi. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Hepatology). He is a Assistant Professor, Hepatology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Rofiqul Islam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi is 4pm to 10pm (Closed: Friday).
